name: The Spot Cream
description: Remove your dark spots for $36/month (starting with a 2-month supply). A prescription dark spot corrector cream packed with hydroquinone and powerful ingredients that treat melasma, fade dark spots, and brighten the complexion.

ingredients.name: Hydroquinone
ingredients.description: Fades dark spots by preventing the formation of excess melanin in skin.
ingredients.howItWorks: Targets discoloration at its source by inhibiting the overproduction of melanin that causes dark spots, melasma, and post-inflammatory marks.

ingredients.name: Niacinamide
ingredients.description: Reduces inflammation, improving smoothness and skin structure.
ingredients.howItWorks: Calibrates oil production to prevent clogged pores while strengthening the skin barrier and soothing inflammation to reduce redness from acne and rosacea.

ingredients.name: Azelaic Acid
ingredients.description: Helps skin renew faster and kill bacteria that cause acne and rosacea.
ingredients.howItWorks: Accelerates the shedding of discolored surface cells to smooth texture, while also interrupting variant pigment production and eliminating bacteria to resolve breakouts and restore an even skin tone.

ingredients.name: Tretinoin
ingredients.description: Speeds up the skin cell turnover process to treat wrinkles, acne, and more.
ingredients.howItWorks: Reboots the skin's cell turnover rate to purge clogged pores, smooth uneven texture, rebuild collagen for fewer wrinkles, and push fresh, undamaged cells to the surface.

ingredients.name: Hydrocortisone
ingredients.description: Mild steroid used to treat redness, itching, and inflammation of the skin.
ingredients.howItWorks: Calms the underlying inflammatory response that causes persistent redness, discomfort, and flare-ups from conditions like rosacea.

ingredients.name: Tranexamic Acid
ingredients.description: Blocks excess melanin production to fade dark spots.
ingredients.howItWorks: Intercepts the pigment-producing pathways triggered by UV light, hormones, and irritation, effectively fading existing dark spots and preventing new ones from forming.

ingredients.name: Vitamin C
ingredients.description: A potent antioxidant that helps tone and repair the skin.
ingredients.howItWorks: Deploys potent antioxidant power to repair UV-induced cellular damage, helping to fade discoloration and restore the skin's natural brightness and tone.

ingredients.name: Kojic Acid
ingredients.description: A brightening antioxidant that helps reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation and uneven tone.
ingredients.howItWorks: Inhibits the tyrosinase enzyme involved in melanin synthesis, gradually lightening dark spots.

howWhy: Prevents the formation of excess melanin. Reduces inflammation. Improves skin structure. Dermatologist-formulated with concentrated prescription ingredients. Freshly compounded at the pharmacy, ensuring maximum efficacy.
howToUse: After cleansing skin, apply one pump to the hyperpigmented area and gently massage. It can be used as a spot treatment, all over face, or as directed by your doctor. Our dermatologists suggest using a gentle hydrating moisturizer after applying. Be sure to wear a mineral-based sunscreen with minimum SPF 30 daily, as your skin will be extra sensitive to sun exposure. Results typically seen in 6-8 weeks with consistent use. One bottle contains approximately a 2-month supply.

name: The Anti-Aging Cream
description: Treat face wrinkles and fine lines for $35/month (starting with a 2-month supply). Prescription anti-aging cream made with freshly compounded tretinoin, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide to effectively treat wrinkles, fine lines, acne, and sun damage.

ingredients.name: Tretinoin
ingredients.description: Speeds up the skin cell turnover process to treat wrinkles, acne, and more.
ingredients.howItWorks: Reboots the skin's cell turnover rate to purge clogged pores, smooth uneven texture, rebuild collagen for fewer wrinkles, and push fresh, undamaged cells to the surface.

ingredients.name: Niacinamide
ingredients.description: Reduces inflammation, improving smoothness and skin structure.
ingredients.howItWorks: Calibrates oil production to prevent clogged pores while strengthening the skin barrier and soothing inflammation to reduce redness from acne and rosacea.

ingredients.name: Hyaluronic Acid
ingredients.description: Retains moisture, reducing loss of elasticity and skin aging.
ingredients.howItWorks: Acts as a hydration reservoir for the skin, drawing in moisture to counteract dehydration, plump the surface, and restore elasticity.

howWhy: Speeds up skin cell turnover. Treats wrinkles, fine lines & acne. Reduces hyperpigmentation while hydrating the skin. Promotes a smoother, more even texture. Dermatologist-formulated with concentrated prescription ingredients. Freshly compounded for maximum efficacy.
howToUse: After cleansing skin, apply one pump to your fingertips and gently massage onto your face—or as directed by your doctor. Use a gentle moisturizer after applying. Wear a mineral-based sunscreen (SPF 30+) daily. Results typically seen in 6-8 weeks with consistent use. One bottle ≈ 2-month supply.

ingredients.howItWorks: Reboots the skin's cell turnover rate to smooth texture and push fresh, undamaged cells to the surface.

name: The KP Cream
description: Treat keratosis pilaris (chicken skin) for $49/month (starting with a 2-month supply). A prescription cream formulated to smooth KP bumps and redness.

ingredients.name: Urea
ingredients.description: Moisturizes and softens rough, bumpy KP skin.
ingredients.howItWorks: Breaks down hardened keratin and draws in moisture to smooth dryness and rough texture.

ingredients.name: Salicylic Acid
ingredients.description: Helps loosen and remove dead skin cells.
ingredients.howItWorks: Dissolves pore-clogging debris and compacted keratin to reduce bumps.

ingredients.name: Triamcinolone
ingredients.description: Temporarily reduces redness and softens KP bumps.
ingredients.howItWorks: Dampens local inflammatory signals that contribute to redness and irritation.

ingredients.name: Tretinoin
ingredients.howItWorks: Promotes faster shedding of keratin plugs and supports smoother texture.

ingredients.name: Diclofenac
ingredients.description: Topical anti-inflammatory that reduces redness and discomfort.
ingredients.howItWorks: Directly targets inflammation around clogged follicles, easing redness and irritation characteristic of KP.

ingredients.name: Tacrolimus
ingredients.description: Helps soothe inflammation and support smoother texture.
ingredients.howItWorks: Modulates inflammatory pathways to calm persistent redness and roughness.

howWhy: Fusion base enhances penetration through body skin. Increases cell turnover, helps remove excess keratin, moisturizes, and reduces redness. Dermatologist-formulated and freshly compounded.
howToUse: At night, massage 1 full pump onto KP areas after cleansing and drying the skin, or as directed by your doctor. Results typically in ~4 weeks. One bottle ≈ 2-month supply.

ingredients.name: Eflornithine
ingredients.description: Blocks the enzyme that stimulates hair growth.
ingredients.howItWorks: Works at the follicular level to block a key enzyme responsible for hair production, directly targeting androgen-driven growth.

howWhy: Penetrates to the follicle level to slow hair growth by inhibiting ODC enzyme activity. Freshly compounded for potency.
howToUse: After cleansing, apply one pump to affected facial areas up to twice daily, or as directed. Moisturize after applying and wear SPF 30+ daily. Results in ~6–8 weeks. One bottle ≈ 2-month supply.

name: The Spot Peel
description: Fast-acting chemical peel designed to kick-start fading facial dark spots while unifying skin tone and enhancing luminosity.

ingredients.name: Azelaic Acid
ingredients.howItWorks: Accelerates shedding of pigmented surface cells and reduces bacteria.

ingredients.name: Tretinoin
ingredients.howItWorks: Promotes rapid renewal for smoother, brighter skin.

ingredients.name: Arbutin
ingredients.description: Brightening agent that reduces melanin formation.
ingredients.howItWorks: Inhibits tyrosinase to gradually lighten dark spots.

ingredients.name: Hydroquinone
ingredients.description: Fades dark spots by limiting melanin overproduction.
ingredients.howItWorks: Targets pigment pathways to reduce existing and future discoloration.

ingredients.name: Vitamin C
ingredients.howItWorks: Helps repair UV damage and boost radiance.

ingredients.name: Titanium Dioxide
ingredients.description: Provides protective shielding during peel period.
ingredients.howItWorks: Physically blocks UV exposure to protect sensitized skin post-application.

howWhy: Prevents excess melanin, reduces inflammation, and improves skin structure. Most effective when paired with The Spot Cream for continued treatment. Freshly compounded.
howToUse: Patch test first. Apply a thin, even layer to the entire face (≈1/4 of medication). After 1–2 hours, apply another layer for a thick coat. After 8–12 hours, wipe off and cleanse; then apply a thick moisturizer. One-time treatment; results typically within 30 days. Maintain with The Spot Cream.

name: The Hair Pill (Women)
description: Grow your hair back for $32/month (starting with a 3-month supply). Oral hair growth medication with minoxidil, dutasteride, spironolactone and supportive nutrients.

ingredients.name: Minoxidil
ingredients.description: Improves blood flow to follicles to support growth.
ingredients.howItWorks: Widens scalp vessels to increase oxygen and nutrient delivery to shrunken follicles.

ingredients.name: Dutasteride
ingredients.description: Inhibits production of DHT, the hair loss hormone.
ingredients.howItWorks: Intercepts conversion of testosterone to DHT to halt miniaturization and reactivate growth.

ingredients.name: Spironolactone
ingredients.howItWorks: Blocks androgen receptors on follicles to shield against miniaturizing hormones.

ingredients.name: Ketoconazole
ingredients.howItWorks: Reduces DHT pathway activity and inflammation for an optimal growth environment.

howWhy: Improves follicle blood flow, inhibits DHT, and blocks androgen signaling; includes supportive nutrients. Freshly compounded.
howToUse: Take once nightly with water, or as directed. Reduced shedding in 3–6 months; regrowth 6–12 months. One bottle ≈ 3-month supply.

ingredients.name: Minoxidil

ingredients.howItWorks: Extends anagen to promote longer, thicker strands.

ingredients.name: Caffeine
ingredients.howItWorks: Boosts microcirculation and counteracts DHT effects at the follicle.

ingredients.name: Cetirizine
ingredients.howItWorks: Calms inflammation around follicles to support stronger growth.

ingredients.name: Melatonin
ingredients.howItWorks: Shields follicles from oxidative stress and environmental damage.

howWhy: Exosomes condition the scalp and follicles; latanoprost extends growth phase; caffeine, cetirizine, and melatonin support thicker, stronger hair.
howToUse: Apply 0.5–1 dropperful nightly to scalp. Do not wet hair for 4 hours. Apply only to scalp. Results 3–6 months for shedding ↓; 6–12 months for density ↑. One bottle ≈ 3-month supply.

name: The Hair Solution Bundle (Women)
description: Includes Classic + Exosomes formulas for $69/month (starting with a 3-month supply). Layered approach to treat hair loss and encourage growth.

ingredients.name: Minoxidil
ingredients.howItWorks: Widens vessels and prolongs anagen.

ingredients.name: Dutasteride
ingredients.howItWorks: Reduces follicular miniaturization via DHT blockade.

ingredients.name: Spironolactone
ingredients.howItWorks: Blocks androgen receptors on follicles.

ingredients.name: Tretinoin
ingredients.howItWorks: Speeds turnover; may enhance minoxidil uptake.

ingredients.name: Ketoconazole
ingredients.howItWorks: Lowers inflammation and DHT signaling.

ingredients.name: Hydrocortisone
ingredients.howItWorks: Calms redness to improve tolerance.

ingredients.name: iPSC Exosomes
ingredients.howItWorks: Signals growth-supportive activity.

ingredients.name: Latanoprost
ingredients.howItWorks: Prolongs anagen for thicker strands.

ingredients.name: Caffeine
ingredients.howItWorks: Boosts microcirculation; counters DHT effects.

ingredients.name: Cetirizine
ingredients.howItWorks: Reduces inflammation around follicles.

ingredients.name: Melatonin
ingredients.howItWorks: Protects follicles from oxidative stress.

howWhy: Classic boosts blood flow and blocks DHT; Exosomes conditions follicles and extends growth phase. Layering supports complementary mechanisms.
howToUse: Apply Exosomes first, then Classic after a few minutes (or per doctor). 0.5–1 dropperful of each nightly. Do not wet hair 4 hours. Results 3–6 months for shedding ↓; 6–12 months for density ↑. One bottle each ≈ 3-month supply.

name: The Red Set
description: Eliminate your rosacea for $62/month (starting with a 2-month supply). A comprehensive routine to calm redness, flushing, and acne-like bumps.

ingredients.name: Sulfur
ingredients.description: Keeps pores unblocked and combats bacteria.
ingredients.howItWorks: Prevents pore blockages and suppresses bacteria that contribute to pustules.

ingredients.name: Sodium Sulfacetamide
ingredients.howItWorks: Inhibits bacterial growth linked to rosacea and acne.

ingredients.name: Ivermectin
ingredients.howItWorks: Calms underlying inflammation to reduce persistent redness.

ingredients.name: Metronidazole
ingredients.howItWorks: Reduces inflammatory lesions and erythema.

ingredients.name: Niacinamide
ingredients.howItWorks: Strengthens barrier and reduces redness.

ingredients.name: Azelaic Acid
ingredients.howItWorks: Accelerates shedding and reduces bacteria to ease bumps/flushing.

ingredients.name: Doxycycline (add-on pill)
ingredients.howItWorks: Decreases inflammatory lesions and bacterial overgrowth in severe cases.

howWhy: A three-step regimen to gently cleanse, calm inflammation, reduce bacteria, and control severe flares when needed.
howToUse: Mask: leave on 5–10 minutes and rinse. Cream: apply 1 pump and massage in. Add-on Pill: for severe cases per doctor. Use SPF 30+ daily.

pairsWith.name: The Red Rescue
pairsWith.description: Topical treatment that reduces redness and flushing

name: The Eye Serum
description: Keep crow’s feet and dark circles away for $41/month (starting with a 2-month supply). Prescription-strength eye serum with iPSC exosomes, tretinoin, caffeine, and hydroquinone to smooth lines, reduce puffiness, and brighten dark circles.

ingredients.name: iPSC Exosomes
ingredients.description: Signals renewal for smoother eye skin.
ingredients.howItWorks: Encourages collagen production and cell turnover for firmer, smoother texture.

ingredients.name: Tretinoin
ingredients.description: Speeds cell turnover and supports collagen.
ingredients.howItWorks: Promotes renewal and elasticity in delicate periocular skin.

ingredients.name: Caffeine
ingredients.howItWorks: Stimulates microcirculation to reduce fluid retention and under-eye bags.

ingredients.name: Hyaluronic Acid
ingredients.howItWorks: Attracts moisture to improve elasticity and smoothness.

ingredients.name: Hydroquinone
ingredients.description: Targets dark pigment under the eyes.
ingredients.howItWorks: Inhibits melanin overproduction to brighten dark circles.

ingredients.name: Niacinamide
ingredients.howItWorks: Reduces redness and supports smoother texture.

ingredients.name: Vitamin C
ingredients.howItWorks: Helps repair UV damage and boost radiance.

ingredients.name: Bisabolol
ingredients.howItWorks: Soothes delicate eye area and supports recovery.

howWhy: Increases collagen, speeds turnover, stimulates microcirculation, hydrates, and targets pigment for a brighter, smoother eye area. Freshly compounded.
howToUse: Gently tap one pump around the orbital bone on clean, dry skin, or as directed. Moisturize after applying and wear SPF 30+ daily. Results ~6–8 weeks. One bottle ≈ 2-month supply.

name: The Lash Serum
description: Grow and strengthen your eyelashes for $33/month (starting with a 3-month supply). Prescription eyelash serum formulated for lash growth and darker, stronger lashes.

ingredients.name: Latanoprost
ingredients.description: Extends the anagen phase of eyelash growth.
ingredients.howItWorks: Prolongs the growth phase so lashes grow longer and thicker before shedding.

howWhy: Triggers and extends the anagen hair cycle for fuller, longer lashes.
howToUse: At night on clean, dry skin remove contact lenses. Apply 1 drop to a sterile applicator and swipe along upper lash line; repeat with a new applicator for the other eye. Visible improvements ~8 weeks; full results ~16 weeks. Two bottles ≈ 3-month supply.
